Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bake in the preheated oven until set and lightly golden, about 15 minutes.
Bake in the preheated oven until the balls are a light golden brown, about 10 to 12 minutes.

Combine 6 cups of confectioners' sugar in a bowl; coat the balls in the sugar until thoroughly covered, then arrange them on a plate to cool completely. Roll the balls in the confectioners' sugar once more.
The nutritional information for this recipe accounts for the entire amount of confectioners' sugar used for coating, but the actual quantity consumed may differ.
